mods:titleInfo.mods:title: William E. Hamlin house (Pasadena, Calif.). Garage and outbuildings

Garage and outbuildings for W.E. Hamlin, Esq., Pasadena, Cal., Partial site plan showing driveway, oval lawn and foundation plan of garage and outbuildings ; ground floor plan of garage and outbuildings (cement floor) : Sheet no. 1.

mods:mods.mods:note: "Note -- all doors, unless otherwise marked, to be 6'-8" high.All sash, unless otherwise marked, to be 1'-2" x 2'-10" with screens".
All structures located in one long building with markings -- "garage, [brick] garage, workshop, gardener's tools, toilet, drafting room, bathroom, store room, laundary".
Gift of Jean Murray Bangs (Mrs. Harwell Hamilton Harris), 1960; formerly the collection of Charles Sumner Greene.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Hugh Ferriss architectural drawings and papers

mods:location.mods:physicalLocation: Avery Architectural & Fine Arts Library, Columbia University
